channel.title: Strategy Templates on Product Manager Playbook
channel.description: Recent content in Strategy Templates on Product Manager Playbook

item.title: Product Vision
item.description: A template to define and communicate a clear product vision that aligns teams and stakeholders around long-term direction and purpose.

item.title: Product Strategy
item.description: A structured template to define product strategy, aligning vision, goals, target users, value propositions, and strategic choices.

item.title: Product Principles
item.description: A template to define product principles that guide decision-making, trade-offs, and consistent product behavior over time.

item.title: Product Roadmap
item.description: A template to create outcome-oriented product roadmaps that align strategy, priorities, and delivery over time.

item.title: Prioritization
item.description: A template to evaluate and prioritize product initiatives using clear criteria, trade-offs, and strategic alignment.
